verses.verse: And when <S%H3588><s%> any <S%H5315><s%> will offer <S%H7126><s%> a meat <S%H4503><s%> offering <S%H7133><s%> unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> his offering <S%H7133><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> of fine flour; <S%H5560><s%> and he shall pour <S%H3332><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> it, and put <S%H5414><s%> frankincense <S%H3828><s%> thereon: <S%H5921><s%>

And he shall bring <S%H935><s%> it to <S%H413><s%> Aaron's <S%H175><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> the priests: <S%H3548><s%> and he shall take <S%H7061><s%> therefrom <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%> his handful <S%H4393><s%> <S%H7062><s%> of the flour <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5560><s%> thereof, and of the oil <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8081><s%> thereof, with <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the frankincense <S%H3828><s%> thereof; and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> <S%H853><s%> the memorial <S%H234><s%> of it upon the altar, <S%H4196><s%> to be an offering made by fire, <S%H801><s%> of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%> unto the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

And the remnant <S%H3498><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the meat offering <S%H4503><s%> shall be Aaron's <S%H175><s%> and his sons': <S%H1121><s%> it is a thing most holy <S%H6944><s%> <S%H6944><s%> of the offerings of the LORD made by fire. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H801><s%> <S%H3068><s%>

And if <S%H3588><s%> thou bring <S%H7126><s%> an oblation <S%H7133><s%> of a meat offering <S%H4503><s%> baked <S%H3989><s%> in the oven, <S%H8574><s%> it shall be unleavened <S%H4682><s%> cakes <S%H2471><s%> of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil, <S%H8081><s%> or unleavened <S%H4682><s%> wafers <S%H7550><s%> anointed <S%H4886><s%> with oil. <S%H8081><s%>

And if <S%H518><s%> thy oblation <S%H7133><s%> be a meat offering <S%H4503><s%> baked in <S%H5921><s%> a pan, <S%H4227><s%> it shall be <S%H1961><s%> of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> unleavened, <S%H4682><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil. <S%H8081><s%>
Thou shalt part <S%H6626><s%> it in pieces, <S%H6595><s%> and pour <S%H3332><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> thereon: <S%H5921><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is a meat offering. <S%H4503><s%>

And if <S%H518><s%> thy oblation <S%H7133><s%> be a meat offering <S%H4503><s%> baked in the frying pan, <S%H4802><s%> it shall be made <S%H6213><s%> of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> with oil. <S%H8081><s%>

And thou shalt bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> the meat offering <S%H4503><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is made <S%H6213><s%> of these things <S%H4480><s%> <S%H428><s%> unto the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and when it is presented <S%H7126><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> he shall bring <S%H5066><s%> it unto <S%H413><s%> the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H7311><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the meat offering <S%H4503><s%> <S%H853><s%> a memorial <S%H234><s%> thereof, and shall burn <S%H6999><s%> it upon the altar: <S%H4196><s%> it is an offering made by fire, <S%H801><s%> of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%> unto the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And that which is left <S%H3498><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the meat offering <S%H4503><s%> shall be Aaron's <S%H175><s%> and his sons': <S%H1121><s%> it is a thing most holy <S%H6944><s%> <S%H6944><s%> of the offerings of the LORD made by fire. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H801><s%> <S%H3068><s%>

No <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3605><s%> meat offering, <S%H4503><s%> which <S%H834><s%> ye shall bring <S%H7126><s%> unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> shall be made <S%H6213><s%> with leaven: <S%H2557><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> ye shall burn <S%H6999><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3605><s%> leaven, <S%H7603><s%> nor any <S%H3605><s%> honey, <S%H1706><s%> in any offering of the LORD made by fire. <S%H801><s%> <S%H3068><s%>

As for the oblation <S%H7133><s%> of the firstfruits, <S%H7225><s%> ye shall offer <S%H7126><s%> them unto the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> but they shall not <S%H3808><s%> be burnt <S%H5927><s%> on <S%H413><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor. <S%H7381><s%>

And every <S%H3605><s%> oblation <S%H7133><s%> of thy meat offering <S%H4503><s%> shalt thou season <S%H4414><s%> with salt; <S%H4417><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shalt thou suffer the salt <S%H4417><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of thy God <S%H430><s%> to be lacking <S%H7673><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> thy meat offering: <S%H4503><s%> with <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> thine offerings <S%H7133><s%> thou shalt offer <S%H7126><s%> salt. <S%H4417><s%>

And if <S%H518><s%> thou offer <S%H7126><s%> a meat offering <S%H4503><s%> of thy firstfruits <S%H1061><s%> unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> thou shalt offer <S%H7126><s%> <S%H853><s%> for the meat offering <S%H4503><s%> of thy firstfruits <S%H1061><s%> green ears of corn <S%H24><s%> dried <S%H7033><s%> by the fire, <S%H784><s%> even corn beaten <S%H1643><s%> out of full ears. <S%H3759><s%>
And thou shalt put <S%H5414><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> it, and lay <S%H7760><s%> frankincense <S%H3828><s%> thereon: <S%H5921><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is a meat offering. <S%H4503><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> <S%H853><s%> the memorial <S%H234><s%> of it, part of the beaten corn <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1643><s%> thereof, and part of the oil <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8081><s%> thereof, with <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the frankincense <S%H3828><s%> thereof: it is an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
